Frequently Asked Questions

Do you think you're cute, a front end developer with a really basic site?

Nope. I'm just too busy building awesome stuff to make a fancier website for myself.

Really, I'm proving a point about front end development. This site looks good on any device, and it loads crazy fast because I don't use any JS or external stylesheets -- not even Google Analytics.
